Paper.Title: The "Casual Cashmere Diaper Bag": Constraining Speech Recognition Using Examples

Section.Paragraph: We describe a new technology for using small collections of example sentences to automatically restrict a speech recognition grammar to allow only the more plausible subset of the sentences it would otherwise admit. This technology is unusual because it bridges the gap between hand-built grammars (used with no training data) and statistical approaches (which require significant data).
